item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 9, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Delta: A syntax-highlighting pager for Git, diff, grep, and blame output (316 points | 44 comments)

3. Maxun: Open-Source No-Code Web Data Extraction Platform (19 points | discuss)
4. Multiple new macOS sandbox escape vulnerabilities (497 points | 145 comments)

6. Can humans say the largest prime number before we find the next one? (152 points | 55 comments)
7. Optimize Database Performance in Ruby on Rails and ActiveRecord (17 points | 2 comments)
8. 'Smart' insulin prevents diabetic highs – and deadly lows (65 points | 14 comments)
9. I quit Google to work for myself (2018) (192 points | 106 comments)
10. Stabilizing the Obra Dinn 1-bit dithering process (2017) (438 points | 84 comments)
11. Reconstruction of Lomonosov's Discovery of Venus's Atmosphere (2012) [pdf] (5 points | discuss)
12. A CC-By Open-Source TTS Model with Voice Cloning (44 points | 5 comments)

14. A Brief History of Cyrix (28 points | 4 comments)
15. Funding restored for man-page maintenance (49 points | 25 comments)

19. Claude AI to process secret government data through new Palantir deal (160 points | 85 comments)
20. Algol-68 seemed like a good idea – until it wasn't (45 points | 33 comments)
21. LoRA vs. Full Fine-Tuning: An Illusion of Equivalence (208 points | 48 comments)
22. It's legal for police to use deception in interrogations. Some want that to end (222 points | 178 comments)
23. Claude Shannon: Mathematician, engineer, genius and juggler (2017) (146 points | 50 comments)
24. Why 4D geometry makes me sad [video] (65 points | 27 comments)
25. Zep AI (YC W24) Is Hiring DevRel / Community Managers to Build Agent Memory ( | hide)
26. Neural Optical Flow for PIV in Fluids (11 points | 2 comments)
27. Apple Macintosh before System 7 (93 points | 66 comments)

29. Perceptually lossless (talking head) video compression at 22kbit/s (196 points | 125 comments)
30. Cops suspect iOS 18 iPhones are communicating to force reboots (165 points | 239 comments)
